bug.author: alissiawells
bug.description:
My module, based on deeppavlov, runs on my machine. However, it does not work on a remote sever with Ubuntu 18.04 because of BadZipFile. What problem can be in a paraphrazer.zip, mentioned in the traceback (in a screenshot)? I use deeppavlov of 0.8.0 version with small modifications: github.com/alissiawells/deeppavlov (treshold instead of modelâ€™s verdict in the output) <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35057128/84739865-0c635800-afb5-11ea-8188-6a080f43bcb5.jpeg></denchmark-link>
Want to contribute to DeepPavlov? Please read the <denchmark-link:http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/devguides/contribution_guide.html>contributing guideline</denchmark-link> first.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alissiawells>@alissiawells</denchmark-link> , I apologize for the very late reply, but could you clarify the specific commit you are using? I am puzzled that 2.69k is downloaded instead of 1.16M size of size.
